prefs-wikispeech:
{{optional}}
Used in user preferences as a tab heading.
prefs-wikispeech-voice: Used in user preferences as a section heading for voice selection.
prefs-wikispeech-speech-rate: Used in user preferences as a label for speech rate selection.
prefs-wikispeech-speech-rate-percent: Label for speech rate in the preferences dialog.
prefs-wikispeech-enable: Used in user preferences to enable the Wikispeech extension
prefs-wikispeech-show-player: Used in user preferences to always show the player where available
prefs-wikispeech-part-of-content: "Read" as in read out loud (text to speech). Used in user preferences to enable extra information when reading certain elements out loud.
prefs-help-wikispeech-part-of-content:
"Read" as in read out loud (text to speech). Used in user preferences to further explain enabling extra information when reading certain elements.

See also: {{msg-mw|prefs-wikispeech-part-of-content}}
wikispeech-notice-prefs-apply-on-next-pa: Notice in the preferences popup dialog. Tells the user that they need to reload the page for changes to take effect.
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-raw: The text of the tab going to the edit form for editing lexicon entry as raw text.
wikispeech-error-loading-audio-title: Title for error dialog when audio could not load
wikispeech-error-loading-audio-message: Message for error dialog when audio could not load.
wikispeech-error-generate-preview-title: Title for error dialog when transcription preview fails to generate
wikispeech-language:
Label for language field on the edit lexicon special page.
{{identical|Language}}
wikispeech-word:
Label for word field on the edit lexicon special page.
{{identical|Word}}
wikispeech-transcription: Label for phonetic transcription field on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-item-id: Label for item id field on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-preview: Label for preview button on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-preferred: Label for checkbox that sets the 'preferred' parameter for an item on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-lexicon-next: Label for the button to proceed to the next step on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-lexicon-save: Label for the button to save changes on the edit lexicon special page.
wikispeech-lexicon-add-entry-success: Displayed on the success page after adding a lexicon entry with Special:EditLexicon.
wikispeech-lexicon-edit-entry-success: Displayed on the success page after editing a lexicon entry with Special:EditLexicon.
wikispeech-lexicon-copyrightnote: Displayed on Special:EditLexicon under the submit button.
wikispeech-testlisten-text: Label for the text field on the test listen special page.
wikispeech-testlisten-ssml: Label for the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Speech_Synthesis_Markup_Language SSML] field on the test listen special page.
wikispeech-lexicon-null-edit: Warning for when a user haven't made any changes to a lexicon post they submitted for editing.
wikispeech-skip-back: Wikispeech player button to skip back
wikispeech-previous: Wikispeech player button to go previous
wikispeech-next: Wikispeech player button to go next
wikispeech-skip-ahead: Wikispeech player button to skip ahead
wikispeech-help: Wikispeech player button to get help
wikispeech-feedback: Wikispeech player button to send feedback
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-btn: Wikispeech player button to edit lexicon
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-no-item-found: Error message when no lexicon item is found.
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-transcription-un: Error message when a transcription could not be retrieved from speechoid service
wikispeech-edit-lexicon-speechoid-down: Error message when the Speechoid service is down.
wikispeech-lexicon-sync-error: Error message to ask the user if they want to overwrite local entry with speechoid entry since there is sync problems between the lexicons, such as different properties.
wikispeech-lexicon-sync-error-unidentifi: Throws an error if there is an unidentified error syncing the lexicon entries.
wikispeech-poc-link: The message to read before a link. Only used if the user has enabled extra information when reading certain elements.
wikispeech-pos: What part of speech (e.g noun, pronoun) the word belongs to.
wikispeech-paradigm: What kind of declination that is used for the word
wikispeech-morphology-sin: The word is in singular form
wikispeech-morphology-plu: The word is in plural form
wikispeech-morphology-utr: The word is of common gender
